item.title: Drops [317]
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

Hey guys! Quick question!

So I have this thing where you drop stuff it disappears. I got it so when you drop it, it shows it on the ground, but I cant pick it up. The code that I changed is below, so if you could help me that would be great! Thanks!

createGroundItem(droppedItem, absX, absY, c); deleteItem(droppedItem, slot, playerItemsN[slot]); updateRequired = true; savegame(false); } }

Read full topic
